get.summary: Get a list of currencies with filtering and pagination
get.description: Returns a paginated list of available currencies. Supports filtering based on query parameters.

parameters.name: ids

schema.description: List of identifiers for filtering
schema.title: Ids

parameters.description: List of identifiers for filtering

parameters.name: currentPage

schema.description: Current page number (starting from 1)
schema.title: Currentpage

parameters.description: Current page number (starting from 1)

parameters.name: pageSize

schema.description: Number of records per page
schema.title: Pagesize

parameters.description: Number of records per page

parameters.name: searchField

schema.title: Search fields
schema.description: List of fields to perform the search on

parameters.description: List of fields to perform the search on

parameters.name: searchString

schema.title: Search strings
schema.description: List of values to search for in corresponding fields

parameters.description: List of values to search for in corresponding fields

parameters.name: searchIgnoreCase

schema.title: Case sensitivity
schema.description: Determines if the search should be case insensitive

parameters.description: Determines if the search should be case insensitive

parameters.name: orderBy

schema.title: Sorting field
schema.description: Field to sort the results by

parameters.description: Field to sort the results by

parameters.name: sortOrder

schema.title: Sorting order
schema.description: Sort order: 'asc' or 'desc'

parameters.description: Sort order: 'asc' or 'desc'

post.description: Adds a new currency to the database using the provided details.

get.summary: Get details of a specific currency
get.description: Fetches details of a currency identified by its unique currency code.

schema.description: The unique three-letter currency code, e.g., 'USD', 'EUR'.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity part of the rate value. It represents the numeric value without the decimal separator. For example, '12.34' is stored as 1234.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: The accuracy factor for the rate value. It must be a power of 10 (e.g., 1, 10, 100, 1000) corresponding to the number of decimal places.
